pull.title: build: Set osx permissions in the dmg to make Gatekeeper happy
pull.body:
Fixes #7085.

I can't reproduce the issue on 10.11, so I'll have to wait for someone else to verify. Locally, permissions look ok until added to the image, where 0555 appears to be the default.

issue.title: [0.11] Important backports for 0.11.3 (updated to v0.12.0)
issue.body: These seem fairly important even for a softfork-deployment 0.11.3.

issue.title: OSX diskimages need 0775 folder permissions
issue.body:
Should avoid endless Gatekeeper warnings (fixes #7085).
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7092 did only change the disk image with the unsigned application.

Needs testing during gitian release build phase.
